nodes.text: Flashy was the SSK heavy blaster owned by Corso Riggs during the Cold War. Corso later gave Flashy to the smuggler known as the Voidhound to aid said smuggler's search for Skavak in a Separatist stronghold located in a volcano. According to Corso, Flashy is one of Corso's named weapons, along with Hewey, Sparkles and Torchy.

Flashy is a blaster pistol that can be used in the Smuggler Class in the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic. A player who completes a class mission receives Flashy as a mission reward. Flashy can be modified like all weapons received just before leaving Beginning Planets (Ord Mantell, Tython, Hutta, and Korriban).
